title: macOS 12.3 beta 2 addresses Bluetooth-related battery drain on MacBooks
content:
Since the release of macOS Monterey 12.2 last month, multiple users have been complaining about an overnight battery drain on MacBooks that was related to Bluetooth. Now with macOS 12.3 beta 2, Apple seems to have fixed this bug.

more…

The post macOS 12.3 beta 2 addresses Bluetooth-related battery drain on MacBooks appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Users have been complaining about a battery drain on MacBooks that was related to Bluetooth. This bug has been fixed with macOS 12.3 beta.
